channel.title: Help Loading Models
channel.description:
okay so uhm basically i took optic-pkz by exion and tryed to code it a bit i have done some source sided things now i want to add things client sided. so i decided to add torva,pernix,virtus, zaryte bow and i also added korasi
problem: whenever i spawn the items in game for example i use ::item 13350 1 which is to spawn a korasi it will dc me then i cant login unless i delete the item from my character server sided.
information: ~ i have added the models in the existing raw file ~ i have added the ints in item def ~ i have saved item def and compiled it ~ base is project insanity
ok thats basically all info i have i dont know why whever i spawn it it doesnt work is their another step im missing please tell me a fix or link me a tutorial ive searched for 30 mins found nothing thanks for the help ahead of time =]

item.title: Help Loading Models

item.description:
@darknessxd wrote:

okay so uhm basically i took optic-pkz by exion and tryed to code it a bit i have done some source sided things now i want to add things client sided. so i decided to add torva,pernix,virtus, zaryte bow and i also added korasi

problem: whenever i spawn the items in game for example i use ::item 13350 1 which is to spawn a korasi it will dc me then i cant login unless i delete the item from my character server sided.

information:
~ i have added the models in the existing raw file
~ i have added the ints in item def
~ i have saved item def and compiled it
~ base is project insanity
